name: undisciplined
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not behaving in a very controlled or organized way: The coach should be embarrassed to see the team play in such an undisciplined manner. An undisciplined army may consist of excellent fighters, but they fight as individuals.
More examplesFewer examplesViolent people are usually undisciplined.He was the most romantic of the poets of his age, and his only fault was having an overabundant and undisciplined imagination.It is now virtually impossible to find a pub where you can have a good meal without being surrounded by screaming, undisciplined children.
